ItemTooltip.CombatBook:
Increases the defense and strength of all villagers
'Contains offensive and defensive fighting techniques'
ItemTooltip.CombatBookVolumeTwo:
Increases the defense and strength of all villagers
'Contains offensive and defensive fighting techniques, volume two!'
ItemTooltip.Ambrosia: Permanently increases mining and building speed
ItemTooltip.PeddlersSatchel: Permanently increases items sold by the Traveling Merchant
ItemTooltip.WormholePotion:
Teleports you to a party member
Click their head on the fullscreen map
ItemTooltip.JungleKey: Unlocks a Jungle Chest in the dungeon
ItemTooltip.CorruptionKey: Unlocks a Corruption Chest in the dungeon
ItemTooltip.CrimsonKey: Unlocks a Crimson Chest in the dungeon
ItemTooltip.HallowedKey: Unlocks a Hallowed Chest in the dungeon
ItemTooltip.FrozenKey: Unlocks an Ice Chest in the dungeon
ItemTooltip.DungeonDesertKey: Unlocks a Desert Chest in the dungeon
ItemTooltip.GoldenKey: Opens one locked Gold Chest or Lock Box
ItemTooltip.ShadowKey: Opens all Shadow Chests and Obsidian Lock Boxes
ItemTooltip.HolyWater: Spreads the Hallow to some blocks
ItemTooltip.UnholyWater: Spreads the Corruption to some blocks
ItemTooltip.BloodWater: Spreads the Crimson to some blocks
